title.narrative: Belize Chemicals and Waste Management Project

description.narrative: The project aims to assist the country in implementing its relevant obligations under the Stockholm Convention to reduce the releases of Unintentional POPs emissions and to build country’s capacity to manage chemicals and waste.

title.narrative: Capacity-building for sustainable Natural Resource Mgmt

description.narrative: To enhance Belize’s institutional and organizational capacities for sustainable natural resource management for the effective leveraging of finances to meet Rio Convention Objectives.

title.narrative: Capacity Building for Sustainable Natural Resource Management PRODOC

description.narrative: The goal of this project is for Belize to meet and sustain Rio Convention obligations through a more holistic and cost-effective approach of environmental and nat. resource mgmt for shared national development and global environmental priorities.
